meaning: A call or cry used to urge on hounds.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: That was quite the scene over by the old manor—I've never seen so many beagles lined up in one place.

dialogue.speaker: Julia
dialogue.text: And did you catch the master at the front? He leaned in, whip raised, and belted out, 'Yoicks! Yoicks!' The energy just rippled through the whole crowd.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Suddenly everyone was clapping along, wasn't it amazing? For a minute, it almost felt like we were part of history.

dialogue.speaker: Julia
dialogue.text: Exactly! The tradition really comes alive when you hear those calls echoing across the fields.

dialogue.speaker: Thomas
dialogue.text: Next time they put on a demonstration like that, we should get closer to the action.

dialogue.speaker: Julia
dialogue.text: Count me in—I’ll have my boots ready for a good stomp through the grass!

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: There goes the pack—yoicks! Did you see how the lead hound snapped to attention just then?

dialogue.speaker: Martha
dialogue.text: I did! The whole field seemed to come alive in a second.

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: Nothing stirs the countryside like the sound of the horns and the chase starting.

dialogue.speaker: Martha
dialogue.text: It's impossible not to get swept up in it—my heart’s beating faster just watching.

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: Let’s get a bit closer; from the gate, we should have a perfect view of them taking the hedgerow.

dialogue.speaker: Martha
dialogue.text: Lead the way! I wouldn't miss a moment of this for anything.

meaning: To swallow greedily, hastily, or in large mouthfuls; to gulp.
Representing a harsh, high-pitched bark or cry characteristic of dogs and some other animals.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Whoa, Emily, your burger barely touched the plate before it vanished!

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: What can I say, Alex? When food this good comes around, I don't mess around.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: I'm still on my first bite and you’re already eyeing my fries.

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: You can’t just leave crispy fries out in the open and expect me to ignore them.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Just don’t inhale them so fast you forget to taste!

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: No promises! Watch me yolp down this milkshake next—you’ve been warned.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: Wow, these nachos are disappearing fast—watch me yolp the last one before you even blink!

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Hey! My eyes aren’t that slow, you know. There goes my favorite jalapeño...

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: You snooze, you lose! I couldn’t resist.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: You better watch out next round—I'm guarding the plate with my life.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: Then I’ll have to develop some stealth snacking skills.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Deal! But fair warning, I play to win when it comes to nachos.

meaning: To bark, esp. in a suppressed manner.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Did you just hear something tiny but fierce from the living room?

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Yeah, that was Daisy again. She gave her usual 'youf' when the neighbor’s cat strutted by the window.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: For a pup her size, she sure takes her guard duty seriously.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: She acts like a lion trapped in a chihuahua body.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: If only her courage matched her volume!

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: One day she’ll realize the postman isn’t her arch-nemesis.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: I have to admit, your new dog is doing better than I expected—my slippers are still intact.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Give him time, Olivia. He might just be plotting in silence.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: At least he’s not waking up the building at night like some dogs I know.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Last night, when the neighbor’s cat sneaked by the window, there was just this little youf from under the table, and then he looked embarrassed for making a sound.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: A bashful guard dog—now that’s something special.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: He’ll win you over before you know it, just wait until he brings your shoes instead of chewing them.

meaning: An exclamation of vague meaning.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Yow, my phone slipped right out of my hand and bounced down the stairs.

dialogue.speaker: Chris
dialogue.text: That sounds like a whole adventure. Is it still alive?

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Somehow, yeah—it pulled through with only a tiny scratch.

dialogue.speaker: Chris
dialogue.text: Phones these days are tougher than they look. Lucky break.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Honestly, I should put it in bubble wrap at this point.

dialogue.speaker: Chris
dialogue.text: If you do, send me a picture—I need a laugh after this morning!

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Would you look at that—someone just rolled a tire down Main Street again.

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: You’ve got to be kidding me. Every time I think I’ve seen everything in this town, something new rolls by—literally.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: No joke, and now there’s a kid chasing after it in flip-flops, almost tripping over the curb.

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: That’s bold. Do you think I should grab my phone or just let the moment have its chaos?

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Yow, he just caught the tire in one hand and gave a superhero pose—didn’t see that coming!

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: Now that’s the kind of street entertainment my coffee needed. Only here, huh?

meaning: A smart swingeing blow.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Still nursing your pride from our last table tennis battle, Mia?

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: Oh, please, Ethan! I’ve almost recovered from that wild spin you pulled.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: You mean when I swung so hard my paddle made a huge yowf and sent the ball ricocheting off the wall?

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: Exactly! I thought the table was going to split in half from the impact.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Guess that’s what happens when I get too enthusiastic with my power shots.

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: Next time, keep your power shots on the table—not launching intergalactic missiles!

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: My heart was pounding during that last boxing round. You could feel the tension ramp up every second.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: Seriously, the whole gym went silent when they closed in—everyone just waiting for something big.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Then out of the blue, Miller ducked and swung—yowf—right on the jaw! The way the crowd roared right after, I thought the roof would come off.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: I nearly spilled my drink at that! That punch looked like it could drop anyone.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: I’ve never seen a reaction like that before. Everyone was just buzzing about it all night.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: Moments like that are why I never miss a fight night. Adrenaline for days!

meaning: An expression of strong distaste or disgust.
To vomit.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Guess what happened, Jake—I got convinced to try escargot last night at Sarah’s dinner party.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: No way, you actually ate snails? That is seriously brave.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: It took me a while to work up the nerve. They looked…interesting, to say the least.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: Okay, I have to know—what did they taste like?

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: The texture was so slimy and, ugh, yuck, I almost had to spit it out immediately.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: Well, that’s going straight to the bottom of my food bucket list!

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: I swear, I just took a bite of what I thought was a chocolate chip cookie and it turned out to be raisin.

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Oh no, that’s the ultimate betrayal! Did it taste as bad as it sounds?

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Worse. It was chewy, and I wasn’t prepared for that at all.

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Ugh, yuck. That sneaky raisin feeling gets me every time too.

dialogue.speaker: Emily
dialogue.text: Honestly, someone needs to label those cookies better.

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Next time, I'm bringing my own emergency supply of real chocolate chip cookies just in case.

meaning: An exclamation of pleasurable anticipation, with implication of sensual or gustatory satisfaction.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: You wouldn’t believe what’s waiting in my oven right now.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Now I’m intrigued! What’s baking?

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: A giant pan of triple chocolate brownies, loaded with chunks and topped with caramel.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: That sounds insanely good—I can almost smell the chocolate from here.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: They’re almost done, and the edges are getting perfectly crispy.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Save me a corner piece—yum!

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: My stomach is practically doing cartwheels—it's lunch hour and I can’t think straight.

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: Those wood-fired pizzas from Tony’s have been on my mind all morning. Ever tried their truffle mushroom one?

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: No, but even the thought of melty cheese, earthy mushrooms, and that hint of truffle oil… yum, I’m already counting down the seconds.

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: That settles it, we’re definitely ordering that. I’ll race you there.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Last one to the counter misses out on the best slice!

dialogue.speaker: Oliver
dialogue.text: Game on—may the hungriest win!

meaning: To kill, esp. with a gun; to deal a sudden blow to.
Used to represent the sound of a ray gun, laser, bullet, etc.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Level nine turned up the heat! That ambush in the hangar nearly wiped me out.

dialogue.speaker: Taylor
dialogue.text: Tell me about it! The enemy snipers on those catwalks were brutal—my health bar looked like confetti.

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: And the mech suit dropped in right after! No mercy, just lasers everywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Taylor
dialogue.text: I had to hide behind crates for ages. How’d you even make it through that wave?

dialogue.speaker: Sam
dialogue.text: Had to get creative. A little distraction and some luck—still barely breathing at the end.

dialogue.speaker: Taylor
dialogue.text: Once the shield flickered, I managed to zap that mech right through its core. Easiest win after that!

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: Talk about a wild episode—did you catch last night's finale? That chase through the warehouse had me gripping the chair.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Totally! Just when I thought the villain would get away, the hero spun around and zap, he was down before he even blinked.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: The sound effects were unreal, too. I nearly spilled my popcorn at that moment.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Seriously, my heart was racing. They really turned up the tension this season.

dialogue.speaker: Lucas
dialogue.text: If every episode was like that, I'd never miss a second.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Here's hoping they keep the surprises coming; I need some excitement in my week!

meaning: Originally among homosexual men: to make more stylish or smart; to enliven, make more exciting.

dialogue.speaker: Tina
dialogue.text: Okay, the dress is great, but let's zhoosh it with that sparkly belt you have—instant wow factor.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Hmm, I hadn’t even thought of that. Do you think it’ll work with these shoes?

dialogue.speaker: Tina
dialogue.text: Absolutely, the silver matches perfectly. You’ll look amazing on the dance floor.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: The dance floor needs someone willing to take risks, right?

dialogue.speaker: Tina
dialogue.text: Exactly, go bold or go home! Let’s see the full look with the belt.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: All right, let me grab it! You’re seriously the best at this.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Why does prepping for Amelia’s party suddenly feel like a pop quiz on style secrets? I’m stuck just staring at my closet.

dialogue.speaker: Jordan
dialogue.text: Come on, Megan! Let’s hear what you’ve got lined up, and we’ll brainstorm something fun.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: So far, all I’ve mustered is a white tee and my favorite pink skirt, but it’s not exactly screaming party vibes.

dialogue.speaker: Jordan
dialogue.text: That combo has major potential! Maybe it just needs a little push, you know?

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: You’re right—maybe I’ll add my chunky earrings and a denim jacket to zhoosh things up.

dialogue.speaker: Jordan
dialogue.text: Now we’re talking! That’s the spark you need, Megan. You’re going to look sensational.

meaning: A sharp, high-pitched ringing sound; a twang.
Representing the sudden advent of a new situation or emotion.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: I swear my coffee mug's possessed—this morning it slipped out of my hand and smacked right into the toaster.

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: Seriously? Did it just thud, or was there more drama?

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Oh, there was drama! It made this ridiculous sound and startled the cat off the counter.

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: Let me guess… 'zing!' reverberating through your kitchen, right? That’s the kind of noise that makes you jump.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Pretty much! I nearly dropped the rest of my breakfast after that.

dialogue.speaker: Josh
dialogue.text: Sounds like your mornings come with their own theme music now!

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Whoa, listen to this—when I flick the top string, it goes zing straight through the room!

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: That’s wild! It kind of cuts right above everything else, doesn’t it?

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Totally. I wasn’t expecting that much bite from a brand new set of strings.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Maybe we should try the next string over—see if it surprises us too.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Here goes nothing, let’s see what this one’s got.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: That’s got some serious character. We’re onto something good here!

meaning: Representing the sudden advent of a new situation or emotion.

dialogue.speaker: Lauren
dialogue.text: I just saw your art featured in the magazine—this is huge! How are you holding up?

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: It feels unreal, honestly. One minute I was doodling in my kitchen, the next, my work is everywhere.

dialogue.speaker: Lauren
dialogue.text: I knew your talent would get recognized, but this level of attention must be overwhelming.

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: Exactly! Zingo—suddenly I've got gallery invitations flooding my inbox, calls from people I’ve never met, and it’s all happening at once.

dialogue.speaker: Lauren
dialogue.text: That’s incredible! You deserve every bit of this chaos—it means you’re making your mark.

dialogue.speaker: Mia
dialogue.text: Thanks, Lauren. I just hope I can keep up with it all and enjoy the ride while it lasts!

dialogue.speaker: Rachel
dialogue.text: Honestly, I was settling in for a regular day and then—zingo!—my manager drops a last-minute project on my desk.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: Wait, are you serious? That came out of the blue.

dialogue.speaker: Rachel
dialogue.text: Right? I was just lining up my emails and suddenly I’ve got to draft a whole report by the end of the day.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: That’s rough. Do you need any help getting it started?

dialogue.speaker: Rachel
dialogue.text: If you don’t mind brainstorming a few ideas with me, that would be a lifesaver.

dialogue.speaker: Ben
dialogue.text: You’ve got it. Let’s flip this surprise around and turn it into something great.

meaning: A syllable expressing a light sharp sound such as that produced by a bullet or other small or slender object passing rapidly through the air or through some obstacle, or by the tearing of canvas or the like.

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Is that a paper airplane you just made? It looks like it could actually fly pretty far.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Yeah, I think I finally perfected the design. Want to see how it glides?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: Definitely. Give it your best shot—aim for the hallway!

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Here goes! Zip! Did you see how fast it shot past the bookshelf?

dialogue.speaker: Alex
dialogue.text: That was awesome! I wasn’t expecting it to move that quickly.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Told you this design was good! Next time, we should try for the living room.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Look at that straight stretch over there—perfect for testing out the new drone’s speed.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Watch this—if I angle it just right, you’ll hear it zip between those trees!

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Whoa! That was slick, it barely missed the branches.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: I’ve been practicing dodging obstacles all week.

dialogue.speaker: Ethan
dialogue.text: Let’s see if you can thread it under the bench next.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Challenge accepted! Get ready to duck just in case.

meaning: The noise made by the rapid motion of a wheel.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Did you take your bike through the city today, Liam? I thought I saw you whizzing past the bakery.

dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: Yeah, that was me! The wheels made this crazy zizz sound when I sped around the corner near the bookstore.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: That must have felt awesome! I always love it when my bike makes cool noises like that.

dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: It's such a rush. The sound just makes everything seem faster!

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: I need to come with you sometime. Maybe I can catch up if I get a head start.

dialogue.speaker: Liam
dialogue.text: Deal! Next weekend, let’s race and see who gets the loudest ride.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: My back tire's been acting up again; it feels off every time I pedal harder.

dialogue.speaker: Luke
dialogue.text: Let me get it up on the stand and give that wheel a proper spin.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Yeah, see if you can figure out what’s going on—it’s been bugging me all week.

dialogue.speaker: Luke
dialogue.text: *spins wheel* There it is again! That sharp zizz every time it picks up speed.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: Sounds like trouble—I definitely don’t remember hearing anything like that before.

dialogue.speaker: Luke
dialogue.text: No worries, I’ll check the axle and clean out the bearings; we’ll get you rolling smooth again.

meaning: Representing the sound of a blow or heavy impact, used to indicate finality.

dialogue.speaker: Mark
dialogue.text: There it was, the final round—Eddie landed his right hook and zonk! The challenger dropped like a sack of bricks.

dialogue.speaker: Jenna
dialogue.text: I know! I barely had time to process what happened. That was the definition of a game-changing hit.

dialogue.speaker: Mark
dialogue.text: For real, you could see everyone in the front row just freeze. No question about who won after that.

dialogue.speaker: Jenna
dialogue.text: Eddie really earned his belt tonight; the crowd was wild right after.

dialogue.speaker: Mark
dialogue.text: He’s going to be all over the sports pages tomorrow—nobody’s forgetting that finish.

dialogue.speaker: Jenna
dialogue.text: And now, every contender is probably rethinking their strategy. That kind of ending makes a statement.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: You should have seen the end of that Jenga game—we were both holding our breath, and the whole tower was swaying like crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Daniel
dialogue.text: That sounds nerve-wracking! Who ended up making the move?

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: I barely touched one block, and then zonk! The entire stack crashed down in one spectacular fall.

dialogue.speaker: Daniel
dialogue.text: Oh wow, that must've startled everyone around!

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: We couldn't stop laughing. Even the people at the next table gave us a round of applause.

dialogue.speaker: Daniel
dialogue.text: That’s the sort of dramatic finish those game nights need!

meaning: To move or travel very quickly, esp. making a continuous humming, buzzing, or droning sound.
Representing a zooming sound, as made by something travelling at speed.

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: If only you’d been there—those motorcycles would zoom right by us, and the wind they kicked up nearly blew my hat off!

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: That sounds wild! Did you manage to catch any photos before they disappeared around the bend?

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: I tried, but most of the shots are just blurs and flashes of color.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: That must’ve been so intense up close. What was your favorite part?

dialogue.speaker: Jake
dialogue.text: The adrenaline rush every time the racers switched gears—it felt like the world slowed down for a second, then snapped back into action.

dialogue.speaker: Maya
dialogue.text: Alright, you’ve convinced me! Next time I’m grabbing earplugs and coming with you.

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: My watch is screaming at me—I should have left ten minutes ago!

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Wow, what’s got you rushing around so much today?

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: If I miss this interview, I’ll kick myself all week.

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Is your bike ready to go or are you planning to run all the way there?

dialogue.speaker: Olivia
dialogue.text: Bike for sure—it’s parked right outside and all fueled up.

dialogue.speaker: Jack
dialogue.text: Alright, I’ll watch you zoom down the block and send some good luck your way!

meaning: To make a humming, buzzing, or droning sound.
Representing a buzzing, humming, or droning sound.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: That old projector's acting up again in the conference room.

dialogue.speaker: James
dialogue.text: Yeah, I noticed it starting to get louder during the meeting.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: It's impossible to focus with that constant sound in the background.

dialogue.speaker: James
dialogue.text: I wish facilities would fix it sooner. It’s driving everyone crazy.

dialogue.speaker: Megan
dialogue.text: If I close my eyes, it starts to feel like I’m sitting next to some giant industrial hive.

dialogue.speaker: James
dialogue.text: Seriously, all you hear is that relentless ‘zoon’ through every presentation!

dialogue.speaker: Nathan
dialogue.text: I was hoping for a quiet afternoon, but this café is louder than I expected.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Tell me about it! That espresso machine keeps going zoon every time someone orders—how can anyone focus?

dialogue.speaker: Nathan
dialogue.text: Honestly, it's like a caffeine-fueled symphony in here.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Maybe we should've picked the library instead of this place.

dialogue.speaker: Nathan
dialogue.text: Too late now! Let's see if I can power through with some noise-cancelling magic.

dialogue.speaker: Emma
dialogue.text: Good luck! If you manage to finish your work, I owe you a coffee.
